title: Jury Selection in the Trump Organization Case a Trial of Its Own
description: The challenge for defense and prosecution in the trial, which starts Monday in Manhattan, was to choose 12 people and six alternates who did not have disqualifying opinions.
dc:creator: Jonah E. Bromwich
media:credit: Emil Lippe for The New York Times
media:description: New Yorkers have strong feelings about Donald J. Trump, a fixture of the cityâ€™s tabloid culture for decades before he became president.
